segments.text: I notice the kitchen's layout with the sink along the right wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on, causing the basin to overflow dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A sheet of water pours onto the floor, forming a large puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate meticulously, facing away from the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will soon be drenched if she doesn't move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly to her right, contrasting the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Leftward, open cabinet doors reveal the inviting cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on the splayed stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies while holding onto a plate for balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl cooperates, her arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're like little thieves in this domestic heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a peaceful outdoor scene with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ironic how calm it is outside amid the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I get angry thinking about the wasted water and potential slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should yell to stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
